section.name: Roadmap
section.p: This page contains a very rough and high-level view of upcoming milestones.

ul.li: write detailed documentation: enhanced mvn site (also with more samples), javadoc (also with more samples)
add system tests (starting osceleton process and replaying recorded data)
enhanced all tests by looking at each of them by hand
added more maven plugins checking code; fine tuned checkstyle/pmd/... configurations
eclipse IDE only code checking tools (komplexitaet plugin da) (evtl auch metriken fuer build verfuegbar?)
generating more reports (u.a. auch code quali; zb jdepend)
add new movement detection module and implement basic position detections (and stable value provider? eg: fire volume constantly via x-coordinate)
josceleton facade modul introducen + guice's Privatemodule
add integration tests (using guice for object wiring but leaving out osceleton)

section.p: new classes/connection services: UserManager, MotionTracker, RecentMotionStorage

ul.li: high code quality standards: 100% coverage (line and branch!), zero warnings of PMD, CPD, FindBugs, Checkstyle, TaskTags
